original_text: Now the appearance of the glory of the Lord was like a devouring fire on the top of the mountain in the sight of the people of Israel.
korean_text: 산 위의 여호와의 영광이 이스라엘 자손의 눈에 맹렬한 불 같이 보였고

sentences.original_text: Now the appearance of the glory of the Lord
on the top of the mountain
in the sight of the people of Israel.
